column3: Latest;Ratanakiri:------ According to the Rattanakiri Health Department
column4: officials are closely monitoring the situation following an outbreak of dengue fever in Rattanakiri Province.------ The announcement was made by Dr Oung Rattana
column5: Director of Provincial Health Department at Rattanak Kiri Referral Hospital on Friday
column7: 2019.------A large number of children are currently undergoing treatment at the hospital after contracting the mosquito transmitted disease and tents have been put up to accommodate the extra patients. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/449000
